prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
Thanks for joining our live coverage on an extraordinary day in court, with adult-film star Stormy Daniels taking the stand.

It was a tense courtroom, with Daniels warned to dial back her comments at times. Prosecutors were also told to limit their questions regarding the salacious details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump (which Trump has denied ever took place).

Here's our full wrap of what happened in court today.

This page was edited by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay and Phil McCausland. The writers were Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon, and we had Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein in court.

Court doesn't sit on Wednesday, so we'll be back on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will once again take to the stand to continue her testimony.
stories:
We appreciate you following our live updates on a dramatic day in court, as adult film star Stormy Daniels testified under oath.

The courtroom atmosphere was intense, with Daniels occasionally cautioned to temper her remarks. Prosecutors were also instructed to avoid delving too deeply into the explicit details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump, which Trump has consistently denied.

You can find a comprehensive recap of today's court proceedings here.

This page was curated by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay, and Phil McCausland, with reporting by Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon. Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein were present in court to provide firsthand accounts.

Since the court is not in session on Wednesday, we'll resume our coverage on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will return to the stand to continue her testimony.

We're grateful for your interest in our live coverage of today's dramatic court proceedings, featuring adult film star Stormy Daniels' sworn testimony.

The tension in the courtroom was palpable, with Daniels sometimes being reminded to moderate her comments. Meanwhile, prosecutors were advised to avoid delving too far into the explicit details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump, which he has continually disputed.

For a thorough summary of today's court events, click here.

This page was compiled by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay, and Phil McCausland, with reporting by Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon. Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein provided eyewitness accounts from the courtroom.

As the court will be closed on Wednesday, we'll pick up our coverage again on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will resume her testimony on the stand.

When the court resumes on Thursday, following a short recess, we will continue to bring you updates as Stormy Daniels completes her testimony.
